graph.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show how two or more sets of measurements are related to each other
graph.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Martin showed me a graph of their recent sales.
graph.translation[0].note_box[0].section: The monthly variations in rainfall are shown on the bar graph below.
A line graph is a way of presenting figures in visual form.
Draw a graph to show changes in the death rate over this period.
The different values can be plotted on a graph.
show something on a graph/a graph shows something
The graph shows that wages rose in line with productivity.
graph.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a drawing that uses a line or lines to show the relationship between two or more sets of figures, measurements etc
graph.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: You can use visuals such as charts and graphs to enhance your presentation.
graph.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to draw a line or lines on a graph, showing the relationship between two or more sets of figures, measurements etc
graph.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: Using the above data, graph the demand for wheat and the supply of wheat.
